title: Hearthstone player disqualified for supporting Hong Kong

replies.msg:
Blizzard has just announced the disqualification of Blitzchung from the Asian-Pacific Grandmasters, after the Hong Konger said 'Liberate Hong Kong, Revolution of Our Times' with his gas mask and goggles on during his post-match interview.
Blizzard claimed that Blitzchung violated the regulations of the Grandmasters so as to justify his disqualification and his prize earned throughout this season would be deprived as well.
After the incidence of Mr Daryl Morey, the GM of NBA team Houston Rockets, we are shocked that Blizzard would still suppress the freedom of speech as an American company, that should be upholding the value of freedom. Therefore, please boycott Blizzard and Hearthstone to impose pressure on them, thank you
